text: Étinehem-Méricourt is a commune. It is in Hauts-de-France in the Somme department in north France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2017 and consists of the former communes of Étinehem (the seat) and Méricourt-sur- Somme.Arrêté préfectoral 11 July 2016 == References == Category:2017 establishments in France Category:Communes in Somme
title: Étinehem-Méricourt
